entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:58 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
